articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay deep respects to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at 00:00 on Monday, the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung). 
					Accompanying him were members of the WPK Central Military Commission and the DPRK National Defence Commission and KPA commanding officers, among them Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Yong Chol, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Kang Phyo Yong, Pak Jong Chon, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Kim Rak Gyom and Yun Jong Rin.
					
					Kim Jong Un entered the hall where statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues. Also presented were floral baskets in the name of the WPK Central Military Commission and the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					Written on the ribbons of the floral baskets were the letters reading "The great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always be with us".
					
					Kim Jong Un, with the participants, made a deep bow to the statues of the great Generalissimos.
					
					He entered the hall of immortality where President Kim Il Sung lies in state. And he, together with the participants, paid high tribute in humblest reverence to the President.
					
					Then, he entered the hall of immortality where leader Kim Jong Il lies in state. And he, together with the participants, paid high tribute in humblest reverence to the leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Sports Contest of Military Academies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Sports Contest of Military Academies
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a sports contest of teachers and cadets of military academies on Monday in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, appeared on the grandstand.
					
					Among the spectators were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Kyong Ok, Hwang Pyong So, and generals and officers of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, and teachers and cadets of military academies, and officials, journalists, editors, creators and artistes in the fields of media and literature and arts of the KPA.
					
					There took place a volleyball game between Kim Il Sung Military University and Kim Il Sung University of Politics.
					
					Both teams lost no time to grasp their rivals' tactical ideas and modes of playing and dexterously applied counter-tactics to gain points through surprise attacks and strong smashes.
					
					The military university won the game.
					
					Then followed a basketball game between the two universities.
					
					The players of both teams gained good points by applying combined tactics with main emphasis on rapid attack. They also applied closed up shot and middle and long distance shots to gain points.
					
					The players of the two teams skillfully applied a variety of tactics to break their rivals' defense through agile and rapid playing. They penetrated into the rivals' courts, increasing the rate of closed up shot.
					
					He clapped his hands to encourage them whenever the players displayed good skills.
					
					Kim Il Sung Military University won the hot basketball match.
					
					Korean chess contest and tug of war also took place that day.
					
					Kim Il Sung Military University emerged a winner in the Korean chess and Kim Il Sung University of Politics in the tug of war.
					
					He was greatly satisfied with the successful sports contest between the two military universities and sent a warm salute to the players who showed the spirit of collectivism and played fair matches.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Unhasu Concert
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Unhasu Concert
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu concert was given at the People's Theatre here with splendor on Monday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, appeared in the auditorium.
					
					Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Kwak Pom Gi and Pyongyangites.
					
					The concert began with the playing of the National Anthem. Put on the stage were mixed sextet "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun", male solo and pangchang "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", female quintet "We Sing of Our Country Holding the Leader in High Esteem" and other numbers.
					
					The performers sang high praises of the undying feats Kim Il Sung performed by leading to victory the cause of independence against imperialism and the socialist cause with his outstanding idea, rare leadership and noble traits under the uplifted banner of Songun all his life.
					
					Whenever the image of Kim Il Sung was projected on the background of the stage, the audience was overcome with deep emotion.
					
					National music instrument duet "Three Thousand-ri of Vinalon", mixed chorus "Push back Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology" and other numbers impressively represented the fact that the dignity and spirit of the sun's nation were demonstrated before the whole world and the solid foundation was laid for the eternal prosperity of Juche Korea thanks to the undying leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who remained loyal to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					The concert reached its climax when female solo and male pangchang "Honor for Human Life," female solo and pangchang "Let Korea Forge Ahead to Implement the Line on Simultaneously Pushing forward Economic Construction and Building of Nuclear Force" were staged
					
					The concert came to an end with mixed grand chorus "The Man to Whom Both Destiny and Future Are Entrusted." It made a truthful artistic representation of the will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to win a final victory in the all-out action against the U.S. and the drive for building a thriving nation, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of Juche for all ages.
					
					Kim Jong Un warmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and audience and congratulated them on their successful presentation.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited Mangyongdae on 
					Monday, the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					At the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum they went round historic mementoes and relics on display.
					
					Going round historic relics preserved at the old home of the President, they recollected his sacred revolutionary life.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, and paid tribute to him.
					Seen before the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					Placed there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					Laid before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the C.C., the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					The participants paid high tribute to the statues of the Generalissimos.
					
					They entered the hall of immortality where Kim Il Sung lies in state and made a bow to him in humble reverence.
					
					They went round with keen interest the hall where the orders he received are on display and halls which house a train coach and car.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children in various parts of the country visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their residential areas on Monday, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun), representing the ardent yearning and boundless reverence for them. 
					Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill. 
					
					Seen standing there was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					Floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, organs and enterprises at all levels, factories, farms and schools in Pyongyang and  bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues. 
					
					Also laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					The visitors paid their respects to the Generalissimos, looking back with deep emotion on their revolutionary lives. 
					
					Floral baskets and flowers were also placed before the statues and portraits of smiling Generalissimos at Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang by units of the KPA and industrial establishments. 
					
					Service personnel, people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues and portraits of the smiling Generalissimos in their residential areas to pay high tribute to them.

articles.title: Chinese Embassy Officials Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chinese Embassy Officials Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and other officials of the Chinese embassy visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday, birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					They laid a floral basket before the statues and made bows in humble reverence for the peerlessly great men who made undying exploits for the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Monday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The letter said: Thanks to the April 15 when the sun of Juche rose, the Korean nation could put an end to its history of distress interwoven with flunkeyism and national ruin, greet a new bright morning and take the road of eternal happiness and prosperity of the nation with spring sunshine given off from Mangyongdae. 
					
					The life of Kim Il Sung was an epic-like one of an invincible hero who clarified the truth that arms are a lifeline of the nation and guarantees the victory of revolution, restored the country by leading to victory the hard-fought battles against the Japanese and the U.S. imperialists under the banner of Songun and honorably defended the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					He brightly indicated the path for national reunification by setting forth just and rational proposals and ways for reunification including the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. 
					
					The cause of the Songun revolution based on Juche is being successfully carried forward by you Marshal Kim Jong Un, who are identical to Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					In the letter AINDF vowed to glorify the idea of national reunification and leadership feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and vigorously advance for independent reunification, more deeply cherishing in mind the firm belief that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are always with the Korean people.
					
					It also pledged to join the all-people resistance to frustrate the frantic moves of the hostile forces for a nuclear war and make positive contribution to bringing about a fresh turn in the efforts for national reunification in this significant year which marks the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War in response to the special statement of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants of IAAF-26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants of IAAF-26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Sunday received a letter from the participants of the IAAF-the 26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon.
					The letter said:
					
					We would like to express our heartfelt thanks to Your Excellency for inviting us to IAAF-the 26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon which was held in this beautiful city of Pyongyang on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					We have been greatly honored to participate in this event held on the occasion of the Day of the Sun jointly celebrated by the Korean and world progressive people.
					
					The event was successfully organized at the moment when the situation in the Korean Peninsula is growing tense as never before and served as an important opportunity for athletes from different countries to promote friendship and exchange experience.
					
					Thinking that the success of the event is thanks to your great attention to sports, we would like to extend our gratitude to Your Excellency for it.
					
					During our stay in Pyongyang, we came to witness that the Korean people united single mindedly behind Your Excellency are striving to build a thriving nation.
					
					We, on behalf of the participants in IAAF-the 26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon, sincerely wish the Korean people a great success in the struggle in building a thriving nation and for peace of the country and Your Esteemed Excellency a good health.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Monday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					April 15, Juche 1 (1912) when Kim Il Sung was born was a historic day when the nation greeted the sun of Juche which brought light and prosperity to the land of the country which had been eclipsed on the world map, the letter said, adding: It was also the day of great jubilee of the nation which guaranteed a great fortune of the sun's nation.
					
					Kim Il Sung was an outstanding thinker and theoretician who founded the immortal Juche idea and ushered in the era of human independence and the master of leadership who founded the socialist state centred on the popular masses in the homeland and built the invincible country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					He saved the destiny of the nation by liberating the country and instilling enthusiasm of nation's resurrection and joy of living into the minds of Koreans in Japan who had been caught in distress overcome with the grief of statelessness. He led them to feel the pride of being overseas citizens of the independent and sovereign state by founding the DPRK.
					
					His great revolutionary history was given steady continuity thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who regarded it as his lifelong maxim to carry forward and accomplish the Juche cause. The undying feats Kim Il Sung performed for the movement of Koreans in Japan and his paternal loving care for compatriots had thrown their rays under the care of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The Juche cause pioneered and glorified by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is on the process of accomplishment without any deviation or concession under the leadership of you Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					The letter expressed the will to dynamically wage the patriotic movement with resolve to continue strengthening Chongryon as a model organization of the world overseas compatriots' movement.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). They included diplomatic envoys of different countries, representatives of international organizations and the military attaches corps here, Vishwanath, director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and a delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun headed by Ri Ki Sok, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					They paid high tribute to the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					They entered the hall of immortality where Kim Il Sung lies in state and paid homage to him in humblest reverence.
					
					They went round the hall where the orders he received are on display and halls which house a train coach and a car used by him
					
					They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) before paying tribute to them on Monday.
					They are taking part in the 15th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: Foreign Marathoners Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Marathoners Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign marathoners who took part in the IAAF-26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Monday. 
					They went round historic relics preserved at the old home of the President in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the fact that he was born in a thatched house and devoted his all life to the country and people.

articles.title: DPRK Order of Friendship Conferred on Vietnamese Kindergarten
articles.content:
DPRK Order of Friendship Conferred on Vietnamese Kindergarten
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Order of DPRK Friendship 1st Class was conferred on the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten with due ceremony.
					A ceremony took place in Hanoi on April 5.
					
					Attending the ceremony were figures of the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Education and Training, the Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten, Vietnamese citizens and staff members of the DPRK mission.
					
					The chief of the kindergarten said in a speech it was of great significance that it received the order of friendship on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and its 35th anniversary.
					
					The chief sincerely wished the Korean people greater successes in the efforts to build a thriving nation and reunify the country under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The kindergarten will do its best to remain a symbol of the friendship between the two countries, the chief stressed.
					
					The participants watched an art performance given by teachers and children of the kindergarten and the DPRK film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: Performances Given for Guests of Honor
articles.content:
Joint Performances Given for Guests of Honor
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Joint performances of the Third April Spring People's Art Festival were given for guests of honor at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the National Theatre on Monday.
					Among the audience were senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, Pyongyangites, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					The artistes of art organizations in Pyongyang and local areas participating in the art festival put on the stage colorful numbers dealing with the great honor and happiness of the sun's nation marking the greatest auspicious holiday of the nation, the 101st holiday of the history of Juche Korea.
					
					In song and dance and chorus "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun", female folk solo "There Is No Such Leader as Kim Il Sung in the World" and other numbers the performers sang high praises of his revolutionary life and undying feats.
					
					The artistes of the art troupe of Koreans in Japan, the art group of Koreans in China, the art group of the International United Confederation of Koreans and the art troupe of Koreans in the U.S.  truthfully represented ardent yearning and thanks to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who ushered in a new era of prosperity on this land, making a long journey for patriotic dedication all his life.
					
					The national art squad, national mobile artistic motivational team and participants in the national art festival of working people put on the stage colorful numbers.
					
					The performances were acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Reception Given for Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
Reception Given for Overseas Compatriots
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A reception was given on Monday for overseas compatriots who came here to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					Present there on invitation were the delegations of the Democratic Korean Women Union in Japan, the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, the Association of Koreans in Canada, the Council of Korean Compatriots in New Zealand, the Association of Korean National Businessmen in China, the Association of Korean National Businessmen in Dandong, China, art troupes of overseas Koreans taking part in the 3rd April Spring People's Art Festival and other overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland. 
					
					Kim Jin Guk, director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, and other officials concerned were among those present. 
					
					Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Juche Idea Followers Interviewed
articles.content:
Juche Idea Followers Interviewed
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Followers of the Juche idea taking part in the 14th Meeting of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors of the International Institute of the Juche Idea were interviewed by KCNA. 
					Harish Gupta, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, said that the DPRK is resolutely struggling against the imperialists. 
					
					He went on:
					
					The DPRK manufactured and launched satellites with its own strength and technology and conducted the third underground nuclear test to defend its sovereignty and right to existence. 
					
					This could be done only by the country and nation led by the great leader. 
					
					The Korean people are firmly defending the sovereignty of the country, not reading other's face.
					
					The national power of the DPRK is remarkably growing stronger thanks to the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Ramon Gimenez Lopez, chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, said that the U.S. and its allies thought that sanctions would work on the DPRK. 
					
					But, the DPRK took tough measures one after another to defend its interests. 
					
					The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can provoke the DPRK as it did Iraq. 
					
					Rohekele Andre, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, said that now the world attention is focused on the DPRK, adding:
					
					We fully support the strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force put forward by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, reflecting the mind of the Juche idea followers of the world. 
					
					The just cause of the Korean people advancing along the way of independence, Songun and socialism is sure to be realized.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Visit Kimilsungia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Visit Kimilsungia Festival Venue
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Third April Spring People's Art Festival visited the venue of the 15th Kimilsungia Festival on Monday.
					They were very much impressed to go round the venue which presented spectacular scenery with Kimilsungias in full bloom thanks to the profound reverence of the Korean people and world progressives for President Kim Il Sung.
					
					They went round beautiful flowers of the sun on the stands decorated in an ideological and formative artistic manner.

articles.title: Field Performances Given by Art Festival Participants
articles.content:
Field Performances Given by Art Festival Participants
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Field performances were given by the participants in the Third April Spring People's Art Festival in different places here on Monday.
					Venues of the performances were crowded with people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave a performance at the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower.
					
					In small chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", song and mass dance "Our Great Holiday" and other numbers the performers vividly represented the fact that the new spring of independence comes and a new era of prosperity is open thanks to the April holiday when the sun of Juche rose.
					
					At the plaza of the Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the plaza of the Arch of Triumph the Phibada opera troupe, the art squad of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and the central art squad for agitation for increased production put on the stage chorus "Mine Is Always the Country of Kim Il Sung", male solo "Smile of Love", female sole "Soldiers Live Near the General" and other numbers.
					
					At the plaza of the Central Youth Hall and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium the artistes of the National Folk Art Troupe and members of the art group of the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory put on the stage chorus "We Are the Happiest in the World", small chorus "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun" and other numbers.
					
					A performance was also given by the art squad of the Ministry of Railways at the plaza of Pyongyang Railway Station. Put on the stage were colorful numbers instilling into the audience conviction of hopeful future.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Groups of Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Groups of Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the members of the art groups of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace on Monday to celebrate the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					It began with prelude "We Are the Happiest in the World". Put on the stage were dance "April in Bloom", chorus "We Are Happy under the Care of Marshal Kim Jong Un" and other colorful numbers.
					
					All numbers represented the boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung who showed great loving care for the children, putting forward them as the king of the country with his noble love for posterity and future.
					
					Violin and quintet "Love of General Kim Jong Il" and dance "General Kim Jong Il and Children" mesmerized the audience as they dealt with the dedication of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who weathered cold wind and snow and rain for the good of the country and its people and brought happiness to the rising generation and protected it. 
					
					Among the audience were officials concerned and youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Mosaics Portraying Great Men Erected in Counties, Kangwon Province
articles.content:
Mosaics Portraying Great Men Erected in Counties, Kangwon Province
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Mosaics portraying the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us" and "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Will Always Be with Us" were erected in Chonnae, Thongchon and Sepho counties, Kangwon Province.
					Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, giving field guidance to different places in Chonnae County, including the Chonnae-ri Cement Factory and the Roun Cooperative Farm, clearly indicated the way to be followed by the county and led it to bring about a turn in developing economy and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					Thongchon and Sepho counties, including the Thongchon Fishery Station, Kuup Cooperative Farm, Hyonri Stock-breeding Cooperative Farm and the Sijungho Scenic Spots Management Office, are associated with the undying leadership feats of the peerlessly great men who showed warm loving care for people, while working heart and soul to enable them to lead a better life.
					
					The erection of the mosaics on the occasion of the Day of the Sun is an expression of the fixed faith and will of the Korean people to hold the great men in high esteem for all ages, push forward the building of an economic power and win a final victory in the all-out action against the U.S. under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Unveiling ceremonies took place at relevant units.

articles.title: Day of Sun Significantly Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Sun Significantly Celebrated in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was significantly celebrated across the country. 
					People from all walks of life and school youth and children laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them. 
					
					Mangyongdae, birthplace of the President, drew an endless crowd of visitors. 
					
					The venue of the 15th Kimilsungia Festival, provincial Kimilsungia show halls and Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses in cities and counties were also crowded with visitors. 
					
					Art performances were given at theatres, cultural houses and open-air stages in Pyongyang and local areas before full houses. 
					
					The performers impressively represented their yearning for the President, peerless patriot and legendary hero, in numbers including female trio and chorus immortal classic masterpiece "Nostalgia," song and dance "Day of Sun, Spring Holiday" and male solo and chorus "Sing, Fork to Mangyongdae". 
					
					Artistes and students of North Hwanghae and South Hamgyong provinces gave performances at the North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theatre and Hamhung Grand Theatre. They impressively showed that the history of the President is given steady continuity thanks to the peerlessly great men. 
					
					Officials and other people, members of the women's union and youth and students in Sinuiju, Kanggye, Wonsan and Kaesong cities presented grand choruses in high praise of the undying exploits the great men performed  by devoting themselves to turning the country into a socialist fairyland good to live and work. 
					
					Institutions at all levels in Pyongyang and local areas spent a pleasant day, playing sports such as soccer, basketball, volleyball and table-tennis. 
					
					Public catering establishments across the country including Thongil Restaurant, Kyongam Restaurant, Kanggye Chicken Entrails Soup Restaurant, Taehung Noodle-house served people with diverse food. 
					
					The seats of provinces, cities and counties were beautifully decorated with peculiar lighting on the holiday evening.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Festival under Way in DPRK
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Festival under Way in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The 15th Kimilsungia Festival is going on in Pyongyang to mark the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. Kimilsungia came into being at the initiative of former Indonesian President Sukarno 40 years ago when President Kim Il Sung was visiting his country.
					The festival venue is vibrant with feelings of ardent yearning of the Koreans and foreigners for Kim Il Sung.
					
					Ri Pyong Pha, a department director of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, told KCNA:
					
					"Presented to the festival are numbers of potted Kimilsungias cultivated by many units and servicepersons and civilians, including school youth and children.
					
					Also there are flowers from foreign embassies and international agencies in Pyongyang and friendship and solidarity organizations, individuals and members of aid associations for dissemination of Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia in different countries."
					
					Kim Kwang Ho, director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, said that more than 30 foreign embassies and international agencies in Pyongyang presented 50 odd potted Kimilsungias for display at the current festival. "In particular, Choummaly Saynasone, general secretary of the C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, sent the flower to the festival on his behalf," he added.
					
					Tens of thousands of potted Kimilsungias are on display at the festival.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts on Monday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					Youth and students full of joy and emotion in greeting the Day of the Sun, the greatest auspicious holiday of the nation, gathered at the dancing venues in the city including the plazas of the April 25 House of Culture, the Party Founding Memorial Tower and the Arch of Triumph.
					
					Dancing parties began as songs "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun" and "Song of Mangyongdae" blared.
					
					The dancers presented seas of dances in profound reverence for Kim Il Sung who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness.
					
					To the tune of songs "Mine Is Always the Country of Kim Il Sung" and "My Country Is Best" they danced full of joy, recollecting with deep emotion the brilliant feats of Kim Il Sung who built the socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence on this land and led the people to the road of victory and glory.
					
					Songs "At One Go" and "Push Back Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology" reflecting the will of the Songun young vanguard members resolved to give full play to the youthful wisdom and valor in the all-out action with the U.S. and in building an economic power resounded through the dancing venues, adding to the atmosphere.
					
					Melodies of "Glory to Our Great Party" refreshed the revolutionary enthusiasm of the dancers to glorify the undying revolutionary feats of Kim Il Sung and remain loyal to the party's leadership.
					
					Similar dancing parties were held in the seat of provinces, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Banquet Given to Mark Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Banquet Given to Mark Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at Okryu Restaurant on Monday, the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					Present there were senior party and state officials, chairpersons of friendly parties, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media and merited persons. 
					
					Also present were the heads of overseas Koreans delegations for celebrating the Day of the Sun including the delegation of Koreans in Japan and other compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here. 
					
					Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, in his speech said that the life of Kim Il Sung was characterized by his total dedication to the prosperity and development of the country and happiness of its people. 
					
					The President liberated the country and led the struggle in the grim period of the revolution to victory and built a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence on this land. These were the extraordinary exploits which always remain shining in the history of the nation, he said, adding: 
					
					The august name of the President became a symbol of victory and an immortal banner in the anti-imperialist struggle for national liberation and the struggle for independence of the popular masses. 
					
					The idea and cause of the President was successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Under the wide leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, all the service personnel and people are successfully putting the ideas and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into practice and fully demonstrating the dignity and honor of the sun's nation. 
					
					The speaker stressed the need to remain true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, thoroughly implement the new strategic line of the party for simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and fully demonstrate the dignity and spirit of the great Paektusan nation and build the best and strongest country and people's paradise on this land.

articles.title: First-term Camping Starts
articles.content:
First-term Camping Starts
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The first-term  camping started at children's camps in Pyongyang and local areas on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					The camping brought together members of the Korean Children's Union who set an example in study and organizational life.
					
					A ceremony for receiving campers took place at the Mangyongdae Children's Camp on Monday.
					
					Present there were officials concerned, teachers of the camp and campers.
					
					After a clarion call was sounded, the camping flag was hoisted.
					
					The campers made a salute of the KCU to the flag.
					
					Then followed a report and speeches.
					
					At the end of the ceremony the campers made a march past.
					
					Similar ceremonies took place at the Songdowon International Children's Camp, the Sokam Children's Camp and other camps across the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Pioneer of Anti-Imperialist National Liberation Struggle
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Pioneer of Anti-Imperialist National Liberation Struggle
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime set an example for national liberation movement in colonial countries.
					For the first time in history, he paved a way for achieving a nation's independence and sovereignty with its own efforts.
					
					Drawing a lesson from the anti-Japanese independence movement in the 1920s, he advanced fresh lines and policies for national liberation struggle in reflection of the broad masses' requirements and desire. And he led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory on the basis of the Korean revolutionary forces to liberate the country.
					
					A world culture meeting was held in Cuba in January Juche 57 (1968) with the attendance of progressive men of culture from some 70 countries.
					
					The meeting adopted a document titled "The anti-Japanese armed struggle of the Korean people launched under the guidance of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung", which suggested that the experiences gained in the struggle be examples for the present-day national liberation struggle in colonial countries.
					
					A host of foreign politicians and resistance fighters visited Pyongyang from across the world to learn the experiences from Kim Il Sung.
					
					Kim Il Sung gave clairvoyant answers to the visiting dignitaries on all questions arising in anti-imperialist national liberation struggle.
					
					Inspired by his teachings, many countries in Asia, Africa and Latin America energetically pushed ahead with the struggle, finally achieving national liberation from colonial rule.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Fatherly Leader of Korean People
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Fatherly Leader of Korean People
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Today marks the Day of the Sun, President Kim Il Sung's birthday.
					An endless stream of people has visited his statues built in different parts of the country to pay tribute to him.
					
					People in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea call him "our fatherly leader." The call is an expression of their deep reverence for him.
					
					He liberated the country from the Japanese colonial rule and made its people lead worthwhile life as independent human beings.
					
					He always regarded the popular masses as masters of the country.
					
					Under his loving care, a worker of a power station was appointed minister of construction and a coal miner elected deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					Those who were farm servants, peasants and boatmen in the days of the Japanese colonial rule became labor heroes well-known throughout the country.
					
					In his lifetime, the President visited all parts of the country to ensure the wellbeing of its people, ranging from remote mountainous villages to co-op farms in the area north of the truce line.
					
					His care for the people's living covered all from clothes and footwear to daily necessities.
					
					He even settled family problems on his field guidance tours.  Therefore, he always remains in the hearts of the DPRK people as their real father.

articles.title: Papers Praise Kim Il Sung' Idea and Exploits
articles.content:
Papers Praise Kim Il Sung' Idea and Exploits
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of the DPRK Monday dedicate editorials to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					His revolutionary history is shining as noble one for building the great Paektusan nation, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					He is the great pioneer and peerless patriot who gave the origin to the great Paektusan nation and laid its eternal foundation.
					
					He embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years with a great aim to save the destiny of the country and nation. He defeated the brigandish Japanese imperialists, weathering snowstorm in Mt. Paektu, and thus achieved the historic cause of liberation of the country. Since then the Korean revolution has been inseparable from Mt. Paektu. That period marked the beginning of the history of the great Paektusan nation. 
					
					He led building a new society, the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, post-war rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction. This represented a history of the arduous struggle and great changes to implement the noble idea which was matured in Mt. Paektu. During this history the DPRK was built into a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-sufficient in economy and self-reliant in defence and a heyday was ushered in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					The revolutionary idea, the Juche idea created by him serves as an encyclopedia for the revolution and construction in the present times and an all-powerful treasured sword for building a thriving nation. 
					
					The Workers' Party of Korea founded by him shines as the Juche-oriented revolutionary party most prestigious and strongest in its militant power, the Korean People's Army has turned into an invincible revolutionary Paektusan army capable of defeating any formidable enemy and the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a socialist state centered on the popular masses where they are the master of everything. 
					
					For over 80 years since the Korean revolution started and 65 years since the birth of the DPRK, Mt. Paektu has been a symbol of every victory and its tradition has been the lifeline of the Korean nation. 
					
					The history of the President in which he advanced only along the road of independence and Songun, no matter how the situation might change and whatever one might say, is given steady continuity. 
					
					The steadfast principle of independence whereby the DPRK does everything by its own-style to meet the interests of the Korean revolution, the tremendous military muscle capable of making precision strikes at the strongholds of aggressors wherever they are in the world, the unbreakable single-minded unity of the whole country.  These are a proud picture of the DPRK demonstrating its dignity as the great Paektusan nation. 
					
					Minju Joson calls upon all the people to unite close around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and work hard for bright future of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea and accomplishment of the Juche revolutionary cause full of confidence in sure victory.

articles.title: 10,000 Students of S. Korea Announce Declaration on Peace
articles.content:
10,000 Students of S. Korea Announce Declaration on Peace
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- 10,000 students from across south Korea held a press conference at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on April 11 at which they announced the declaration on peace.
					In the declaration they said the situation on the Korean Peninsula was so tense that a war may break out any moment due to the ceaseless Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					They noted that they conducted the signature campaign in universities and streets across south Korea from March 15 to April 7.
					
					The number of signatories is increasing day by day, an indication of war uneasiness and crisis running high.
					
					The students' option is peace among war and peace, they said, calling for an immediate halt to all military acts of fostering a war.
					
					They demanded the U.S. and the incumbent chief executive of south Korea responsible for the confrontation with the north opt for action to ensure the peace on the Korean Peninsula before it becomes too late.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in China
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in China
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting to remember President Kim Il Sung took place in China on April 12 on the occasion of the 101st anniversary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					Present at the event were Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in China, family members of Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs and persons related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and the DPRK ambassador to China and his embassy officials.
					
					The attendants placed floral baskets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					After going round the photos of the peerlessly great persons on their immortal feats, they watched a Korean film.
					
					The son of Li Zade, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in China, said that the great feats of the President, father of socialist Korea, will always go down in history.
					
					He also noted that the tradition of Mangyongdae family (the President's family) will be cherished not only by the Korean people but by us. 
					
					Chai Long, great grand son of Chai Shiying, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, noted that the President was a man of rare wisdom, strong mental power, broad magnanimity and tender-hearted humanity.
					
					The son of Shang Yue, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, said that the President was a world famous great man with wise leadership ability and clairvoyant wisdom, looking back with deep emotion on the days when he had the honor of meeting with the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung' Leadership Art Praised by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung' Leadership Art Praised by Russian Papers
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups on March 27 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. They were illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					Vladivostok carried an article titled "Iron-willed brilliant commander" which said:
					
					60 years ago, the Korean people won the historic victory in the war.
					
					The young DPRK won the victory unprecedented in history in the war against the U.S. styling itself a power, armed forces of its 15 satellite states, south Korean puppet army and remnants of the old Japanese army. This miracle was possible thanks to the leadership of Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea.
					
					The paper introduced in detail the fact that he set forth the original military idea and led all service personnel and people to victory.
					
					It referred to the achievements made by the heroic Korean People's Army in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					Komsomolskaya Pravda dealt with facts that leaders and prominent figures of different countries praised Kim Il Sung for leaving giant traces in the world political history under the title "Comrade Kim Il Sung was great activist in the 20th century" and subtitles "Toast of Stalin", "Request of Mao Zedong", "Tito's Confession", "Sukarno's Naming" and "Maxim of Che Guevara".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report Carried by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report Carried by Russian Newspaper
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The full text of the historic report made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was carried by the Russian paper Patriot on April 8.
					The paper carried his photo.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated by United Confederation of Koreans in Far East, Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated by United Confederation of Koreans in Far East, Russia
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Nakhodka on April 11 by the United Confederation of Koreans in the Far East, Russia on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					Present there were the vice-chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in the Maritime Territory, officials of Koreans organizations in Nakhodka, Vladivostok, Partizansk, Artyom, Ussuriysk cities and Koreans.
					
					Present there on invitation were the consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka.
					
					The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length picture of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together on Mt. Paektu, and made bows.
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, and a gift to him from the Autonomous Association of Korean National Culture in Ussuriysk City were conveyed to the consul general on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					Then followed speeches.
					
					The speakers said that all the Koreans overseas are yearning for Kim Il Sung who made great contributions to the cause of national reunification, devoting all his efforts to the liberation of Korea and its prosperity and people's happiness.
					
					Kim Il Sung's history as one of the sun will be given steady continuity thanks to Kim Jong Un, they noted.
					
					Korea will shine long as the one nation, reunified thriving nation without fail as long as there is his outstanding leadership, they stressed.
					
					The participants watched a Korean film that documented the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un energetically leading the work of strengthening the People's Army.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked by Newspapers of Laos, Thailand
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked by Newspapers of Laos, Thailand
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Lao and Thai newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					The April 8-14 issue of the Lao paper Heng Ngan carried an article titled "Feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in nation-building" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					The DPRK is holding him in high esteem as the eternal President, the article said, and went on:
					
					He expounded the original idea and theory of nation-building, providing steadfast guidelines for nation-building.
					
					He set up the new type government, people's power and developed it into a powerful weapon for accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					By pursuing benevolent politics, all-embracing politics, he closely united the popular masses around the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government and worked heart and soul to make sure that free healthcare and free education and all other popular policies were thoroughly enforced.
					
					The DPRK is firmly prepared politically and ideologically and in a military technique and has the People's Army equipped with powerful offensive and defensive means and even nuclear deterrent. This would be unthinkable without his feats.
					
					The DPRK is providing a firm guarantee for the prosperity of the country and the nation under the uplifted banner of independence thanks to the firm foundation of the self-supporting national economy laid by him.
					
					The Thai paper Xing San Daily on April 9 carried an article titled "Eternal sun of Juche" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					The article praised the sacred revolutionary life of the peerlessly great man who embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens and made immortal contributions to carrying out the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence through his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					Kim Il Sung will be immortal as the sun of Juche in the hearts of mankind as he hewed out the era of independence and devoted his all to the victory of the human cause of independence, the article noted.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Various events were held in foreign countries to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) from Mar. 26 to 30.
					They included a seminar and a book and photo exhibition in Nepal, a book and photo exhibition in Romania, a lecture in Serbia and round- table talks in Cambodia.
					
					Displayed in the venues of the events were works of the President and photos on his revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					Bam Dev Gautam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), praised the President as an outstanding leader produced by the 20th century and a great leader of progressive mankind. 
					
					C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), said it was one of his great achievements that he successfully solved the issue of succession to the leadership for the successful advance of the cause of Juche and socialism.
					
					The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia said the President defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation and turned the DPRK into a socialist paradise centered on the popular masses.
					
					All the miraculous successes made by the DPRK are the fruition of the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by the President, he added.
					
					Ouk Phurik, president of the Khmer Democratic Party in Cambodia, said Kim Il Sung founded the Workers' Party of Korea, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Korean People's Army and wisely led his country for national prosperity all his life.
					
					The event in Nepal adopted a congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Dhaka City, Bangladesh.
					The work, made public on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that President Kim Il Sung performed the immortal exploits for the cause of national reunification.
					
					It formulates the three principles of national reunification, 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates the tasks and ways for carrying out the cause of national reunification based on them.
					
					The book releasing ceremony was held in Dhaka on April 9.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Show Held in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Show Held in Indonesia
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia show took place at the exhibition hall of the Jakarta Orchid Park on April 10. It was co- sponsored by the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, Bungkarno University and the park.
					Displayed in the venue were flowers of the sun in full bloom in a manifestation of the Indonesian people's deep reverence for the peerlessly great man.
					
					Also displayed there were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, publications introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with rare wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					Present there were Indonesian people of different social standings.
					
					Present there on invitation were staff members of the DPRK embassy.
					
					The president of the university made a speech at the show.
					
					The show is being held in Indonesia every year and the friendly relations provided by President Sukarno and President Kim Il Sung are given steady continuity despite the passage of many years, he said, adding:
					
					Kim Il Sung made distinguished contributions to strengthening the non-aligned movement, realizing the human cause of independence and developing the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					His idea of independence has been widely known to the world and praised by progressive mankind.
					
					We are very pleased that the noble cause pioneered by him is being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The participants went round the show.

articles.title: Kimilsungia, DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Opened in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kimilsungia, DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Opened in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungia and DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were opened with due ceremony in Russia, Guinea, Nigeria, Mexico and Peru from March 27 to April 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Displayed in the venues of the ceremonies were photos on the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men, immoral flowers Kimilsungias, books introducing the true picture of Songun Korea and handcrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					Present at the ceremonies were officials of different social standings and masses of relevant countries. Present there on invitation were staff members of DPRK embassies.
					
					The chairman of the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association said through the exhibition many Guinean people will always remember the august name of Kim Il Sung and his undying feats.
					
					The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism noted that Kim Il Sung was the gifted thinker and theoretician, distinguished statesman and invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation.
					
					The deputy mayor in charge of culture of Trujillo City, La Libertad Province, Peru expressed solidarity for the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: DPRK Films Shown Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Films Shown Abroad
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows were held in Singapore, Indonesia and Thailand on April 5 and 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the first anniversaries of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					DPRK films shown included "Arms of Korea." 
					
					The manager of a Singaporean shipping company said:
					
					Kim Il Sung made a great contribution to world peace and security.
					
					He was the great leader recognized by the world.
					
					Though the situation on the Korean Peninsula remains very acute, the Korean people are sure to achieve a final victory thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					The director of an Indonesian company said that peace and security are preserved on the Korean Peninsula thanks to the Songun politics.
					
					It is thanks to Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of the Songun revolution that the U.S. dares not provoke the DPRK.
					
					If the U.S. ignites a war, it will not be able to escape a disgraceful defeat in face of the Korean people single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un.
					
					No force on earth can match the DPRK's tremendous strength.
					
					I wish the Korean people success in the struggle to implement the strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: U.S. and Its Allies' Moves to Stifle DPRK under Fire in Sweden
articles.content:
U.S. and Its Allies' Moves to Stifle DPRK under Fire in Sweden
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A Swedish paper and website carried articles laying bare the moves of the U.S. and its allies to stifle the DPRK.
					The 14th issue of Proretaren, the organ of the Communist Party in Sweden, carried an article titled "Who is a provocateur?" It accused the U.S. of prodding the UN Security Council into faking up the "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK and then staging provocative war exercises for aggression in south Korea.
					
					The U.S. has refused to accept the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty for 60 years since the Armistice Agreement was signed, the article said, and went on:
					
					The DPRK knows well through what happened in Iraq and Libya that any concession means death.
					
					Under this situation what type of guys criticizers of the DPRK's strong countermeasures are?
					
					The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association posted an article titled "Who is threatened by whom on the Korean Peninsula?" on its website on April 6.
					
					What happened in the last Korean War and other countries proved that it is a trite method of the U.S. to provoke a war of aggression by abusing the UN, the article said, and went on:
					
					The DPRK's countermeasures against the UNSC's "resolutions on sanctions" are for establishing a fair international order and protecting world peace and protesting against big powers' evermore undisguised arbitrary and unilateral practices and UN, its function getting titular. 
					
					The UN should help its member states exercise their rights and perform their missions.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Japanese Organizations
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Japanese Organizations
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Japanese organizations issued statements in support of the just cause of the Korean people.
					The Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement on March 28 demanded the U.S. and south Korean authorities stop at once the nuclear war provocation against the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. military drills on the Korean Peninsula are a wanton violation of the Armistice Agreement, the statement said.
					
					It urged the U.S. not to screw up the tension on the peninsula unnecessarily but replace the AA with a peace treaty and withdraw its armed forces for aggression from south Korea.
					
					The permanent steering committee of the movement of activists groups in a statement on April 1 denounced the U.S. and south Korean authorities for extremely aggravating the situation on the peninsula through provocative war moves for aggression and the Japanese authorities for joining them. The statement noted:
					
					The U.S. and its followers Japan and south Korean authorities are very ones who are stoking the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula. They are opposed to the proposal of the DPRK for replacing the AA by a peace treaty.
					
					Let the workers and forces for the peace movement of Japan struggle against the hostile moves of the U.S., Japan and south Korean authorities toward the DPRK!
					
					Let the workers of Japan, the DPRK and south Korea get united to launch the broad movement for peace against a war targeting the DPRK!
					
					Let the Japanese and Korean people join hands against all forms of suppression of Koreans in Japan!

articles.title: Cuadros del partido y Estado visitan Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Cuadros del partido y Estado visitan Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 101o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 15 Mangyongdae, tierra natal del Presidente. 
					En el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae pasaron revistas a los datos y objetos historicos. 
					
					Luego, vieron los objetos historicos conservados en la casa natal del Presidente recordando su vida revolucionaria.

articles.title: CRPP demanda abandonar la postura conflictiva a autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP demanda abandonar la postura conflictiva a autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada el dia 14 por la ACNC en relacion con que la actual gobernante y el ministro de Unificacion del Sur de Corea propusieron el dialogo, el vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria dio la siguiente respuesta:
					El pasado dia 11, la actual gobernante surcoreana expuso la posicion de dialogar con el Norte de Corea en la cena con los parlamentarios por el "Partido Saenuri" ofrecida en Chongwadae.
					
					El mismo dia, el ministro surcoreano de Unificacion, Ryu Kil Jae, publico la inusitada "declaracion al Norte (de Corea)" en que propuso la solucion negociada del problema de normalizacion de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong diciendo que "desea que salgan las autoridades norcoreanas a la mesa de dialogo para discutir los temas deseados por la parte Norte".
					
					Al respecto, un funcionario importante de Chongwadae subrayo que la "declaracion al Norte" del ministro de Unificacion es una propuesta oficial de dialogo que representa la voluntad de la actual mandataria.
					
					A nuestro juicio, la propuesta surcoreana no pasa de ser una artimana para ocultar su crimen de haber llevado a la crisis la ZIK, enganar la opinion publica y disimular su naturaleza conflictiva.
					
					Nos ofende y burla esa conducta de los que en complicidad de las fuerzas extranjeras, vinieron lanzando brutalmente la campana de "sancion" y "presion" y ejecutando los ejercicios de guerra nuclear y los complots contra la RPDC. Es que ellos estan planteando cinicamente las platicas ahora, como si no fueran nada sus crimenes, sin decir ni una palabra de excusa ni de su responsabilidad.
					
					En estos momentos tambien, en el Sur de Corea se desarrollan los ejercicios de guerra "Foal Eagle" y Estados Unidos y los belicistas titeres del Sur de Corea intensifican sus acciones en busca de guerra anti-RPDC cuestionando nuestras contramedidas militares.
					
					Ademas, la misma propuesta de dialogo es la superficial que no tiene ningun contenido.
					
					Si bien propone el dialogo, el autor de la creacion de la situacion catastrofica de ahora no asume la actitud sincera o seria, por el contrario, tiene la postura extremadamente arrogando diciendo que escucharia lo que piensa y desea el Norte de Corea.
					
					Para colmo, la mandataria y el ministro de Unificacion mezclaron la propuesta con palabras ofensivas como "provocacion", "renuncia nuclear", "cambio" y "repeticion del circulo vicioso", lo que demuestra que ellos no abandonaron la conciencia hostil y la intencion conflictiva.
					
					?Seran posibles acaso las platicas en tales condiciones? ?Habran imaginado ellos cual resultado darian tales platicas?
					
					Parece que la actual gobernante surcoreana trata de repetir la politica de transicion de "confrontacion sin dialogo" al "enfrentamiento con dialogo", de que hablaba tanto el "poder de Yusin" a principios de la decada de 1970. Si piensa asi, seria mejor dejarse de ese drama de dialogo.
					
					El dialogo Norte-Sur no es un juego ni mucho menos el enfrentamiento verbal.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas recurren a todas las artimanas enganando la opinion publica, no podran liberarse de las responsabilidades del actual estado de tensiones.
					
					La confrontacion y el dialogo son incompatibles.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas tienen de veras la voluntad de dialogar, deben dejar primero su posicion conflictiva.
					
					La apertura o no de dialogo depende totalmente de la actitud posterior de autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Ofensores a maxima dignidad seran sentenciados severamente, advierte portavoz de CRPP
articles.content:
Ofensores a maxima dignidad seran sentenciados severamente, advierte portavoz de CRPP
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que solo los titeres del Sur de Corea maldicen de los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar y la humanidad progresista del mundo  que celebran jubilosamente el dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung,  el  portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 14 la siguiente declaracion:
					A traves de los medios de prensa venales, los titeres surcoreanos lanzan blasfemias de que el Norte de Corea crea las agudas circunstancias de tiempo de guerra, por una parte y por la otra, el clima festivo del Dia del Sol para  "demostrar la justeza del regimen" y "consolidar el interior".
					
					No satisfechos con esto, difamaron el autentico aspecto de la unidad monolitica entre el dirigente y el pueblo como supuesta "induccion de fidelidad" e "intensificacion del regimen" y se atreven a acusar nuestra Direccion Suprema diciendo que "esta afligida por la propuesta del dialogo de la parte sur".
					
					En adhesion a su amo norteamericano, los titeres surcoreanos desafian con alborotos de guerra de agresion a las justas contramedidas sobreduras del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC para la defensa de la soberania y la dignidad del pais, e insultan hasta los actos por el Dia del Sol y la maxima dignidad, lo que es una nueva provocacion nunca perdonable.
					
					La locura provocativa cada dia mas recrudescente de la banda surcoreana no es nada mas que el ultimo esfuerzo desesperado de los temidos ante el temperamento de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, que unidos compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un frustran las maniobras de aplastamiento anti-RPDC del imperialismo norteamericano y las fuerzas hostiles, y para detener de todos modos el poderio y la marcha de la Corea del Songun que abre la nueva epoca de gran sucesion.
					
					En el mundo solo los titeres surcoreanos cuestionan y difaman la celebracion de la fiesta de sus connacionales.
					
					El traidor Lee Myung Bak fue fijado como primer blanco de nuestro ataque porque calumnio e insulto atrevidamente la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que la actual banda conservadora es igual a la horda de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					La creacion de la fase conflictiva tan extrema como hoy en la Peninsula Coreana se debe enteramente a la hostilidad acostumbrada de los titeres surcoreanos contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y su caracter conflictivo contra nuestro regimen.
					
					No hay futuro para los titeres surcoreanos que hostilizan a los connacionales y recurren a la politica conflictiva.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo estan vehemente indignados por el proceder de la banda surcoreana que calumnia el Dia del Sol, maxima fiesta nacional, e insulta la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Cuanto mas lancen los enemigos las maldiciones, tanto mas se centuplicara nuestra voluntad de represalia y en el momento de explosion del odio, los traidores seran eliminados completamente de esta tierra.
					
					Nadie puede frenar el avance de la RPDC que sale siempre victoriosa bajo los brillos de Sol del Juche.
					
					Los ofensores a nuestra maxima dignidad seran sentenciados severamente.

articles.title: Responsabilidad de agravacion de tension en Peninsula Coreana recae en EE.UU., subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Responsabilidad de agravacion de tension en Peninsula Coreana recae en EE.UU., subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- En estos dias EE.UU. habla ruidosamente en la escena internacional de alguna "provocacion" y "amenaza" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e induce en error la opinion publica como si esta fuera el culpable de la agravacion de tension en la Peninsula Coreana.
					Por otra parte, argumenta que sus ejercicios militares son para la "disposicion de defensa frente a la RPDC" y la "defensa del pais aliado".
					
					En su comentario individual fechado 14, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que todo esto parte de una intencion intrigante de EE.UU. de encubrir su delito de haber creado una situacion candente en la Peninsula Coreana y justificar sus tentativas de agresion a la RPDC tildandole de responsable de la situacion y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. intenta realizar a toda costa su ambicion agresiva de tomar la posicion hegemonica en la region de Asia-Pacifico al agredir con fuerzas armadas a la RPDC enclavada en un sitio importante en lo estrategico.
					
					Considera que se fracasara su politica hostil anti-RPDC si esta logra la prosperidad economica bajo el amparo de las armas nucleares.
					
					El imperio norteamericano hace todo lo posible para evitar la responsabilidad de haber llevado al umbral de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana mediante las maniobras de aplastamiento a la RPDC.
					
					Pero con tales esfuerzos desesperados no podra evitar la responsabilidad del respecto.
					
					EE.UU. acusa a la RPDC de responsable de la situacion actual con el fin de crear la opinion publica de que esta "es la perturbadora de paz" y preparar el ambiente favorable a sus maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					Esto resulta mal juicio de la situacion.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue por el camino de aplastamiento a la RPDC, esta movilizara el disuasivo de guerra y barrera de esta Tierra los nidos de agresion norteamericanos.

articles.title: Autoridades surcoreanas son culpables de la situacion actual de ZIK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Autoridades surcoreanas son culpables de la situacion actual de ZIK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, en referencia a la medida importante de la RPDC sobre la zona industrial de Kaesong (ZIK), la gobernante surcoreana dijo que "el Norte (de Corea) interrumpio la operacion de la zona industrial que funcionaba sin problemas" y "este debe tomar una opcion correcta".
					Por otra parte, la banda del "Partido Saenuri" y los medios de prensa conservadores y ultraderechistas difunden embustes como si la RPDC ejerciera alguna presion al Sur de Corea en el tema de la ZIK, tales como "climax de la presion (al Sur de Corea)" y "estrangulacion segun un plan minuciosamente trazado".
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual difundido ayer, senala que la responsabilidad del actual estado de la ZIK recae sobre la banda traidora surcoreana que convierte ese lugar en el foco de guerra tomandolo como ultimo blanco de su campana de confrontacion fratricida, y continua:
					
					Es una conducta de bandido que los titeres surcoreanos acusaran a la RPDC en el tema de ZIK.
					
					La banda surcoreana actua como si fuera interesada en el problema de la ZIK con el siniestro objetivo de ocultar su crimen anti-reunificacion de llevar a punto de cierre la ZIK, eludir la denuncia de la opinion publica e imputar la responsabilidad a la RPDC.
					
					Pero, ella no podra imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la actual situacion de la ZIK y tiene que actuar con prudencia dandose cuenta de que sus palabras provocativas pueden poner punto final a la operacion de la ZIK.
